title: Huawei Watch_What is Theater mode?
answer:
You can enable Theater mode when you are at the cinema/theater to avoid disturbing others. Your watch's screen will remain off even when you use screen wakeup gestures (lifting/tilting your wrist), touch the screen, or receive notifications/incoming calls.

NOTE:

Theater mode is not equivalent to power saving mode. When Theater mode is enabled, you will not be able to view the time, notifications, or incoming calls, therefore we recommend that you only enable this mode when necessary.
